# Microsoft.Extensions Libraries

> Common application building blocks from the `Microsoft.Extensions.*` libraries including dependency injection, configuration, logging, caching, and HTTP clients. Key types include `IServiceCollection`, `IConfiguration`, `ILogger`, `IMemoryCache`, and `IHttpClientFactory`. Also covers globalization, channels, and compliance features like data redaction.

*Topics available: 63*

- [Best Practices for Developing World-Ready Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps.md): Learn more about: Best practices for developing world-ready applications
- [Caching in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/caching.md): Discover effective ways to implement in-memory and distributed caching in .NET. Boost app performance and scalability with .NET caching.
- [Channels](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/channels.md): Learn the official synchronization data structures in System.Threading.Channels for producers and consumers with .NET.
- [Deploy a Worker Service to Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/cloud-service.md): Deploy your .NET Worker Service to Azure with ease, learning from a step-by-step process to optimize your workflow, including Docker and Azure Container Registry.
- [Compliance libraries in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/compliance.md): Learn how to use compliance libraries to implement compliance features in .NET applications.
- [Compile-time configuration source generation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/configuration-generator.md): Learn how to use the configuration source generator to intercept specific call sites and bypass reflection-based configuration binding.
- [Configuration providers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/configuration-providers.md): Discover how to configure .NET apps using the configuration provider API and the available configuration providers.
- [Configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/configuration.md): Learn how to use the Configuration API to configure .NET applications. Explore various inbuilt configuration providers.
- [Console log formatting](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/console-log-formatter.md): Learn how to use and implement custom console log formatting in your .NET apps. Register and create new log formatters for better application logging.
- [Create resource files](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/create-resource-files.md): Make resource files for .NET apps. Build text files with string resources, XML or binary files programmatically, or XML files with string, image, or object data.
- [Create satellite assemblies](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/create-satellite-assemblies.md): Get started with creating satellite assemblies for .NET apps. A satellite assembly can be easily updated or replaced to provide localized resources.
- [Implement a custom configuration provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/custom-configuration-provider.md): Learn how to implement a custom configuration provider in .NET apps. Explore a database configuration provider that uses Entity Framework Core.
- [Implement a custom logging provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/custom-logging-provider.md): Discover how to implement a custom logging provider with colorized logs, writing custom C# ILogger and ILoggerProvider implementations.
- [Data classification in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/data-classification.md): Learn how to use .NET data classification libraries to categorize your application's data.
- [Data redaction in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/data-redaction.md): Learn how to use .NET data redaction libraries to protect your application's sensitive data.
- [Dependency injection basics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/dependency-injection-basics.md): Learn how to use dependency injection (DI) in your .NET apps with this simple example. Follow along with this pragmatic guide to understand DI basics in C#.
- [Dependency injection guidelines](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/dependency-injection-guidelines.md): Discover effective dependency injection guidelines and best practices for developing .NET apps. Deepen your understanding of inversion of control.
- [Use dependency injection](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/dependency-injection-usage.md): Learn how to use dependency injection in your .NET apps with this comprehensive tutorial. Follow along with this pragmatic guide to understand DI in C#.
- [Dependency injection](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/dependency-injection.md): Learn how to use dependency injection within your .NET apps. Discover how to registration services, define service lifetimes, and express dependencies in C#.
- [File globbing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/file-globbing.md): Learn how to use file globbing in .NET to match various files with the same partial names, extensions, or segments.
- [.NET Generic Host](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/generic-host.md): Learn about the .NET Generic Host, which is responsible for app startup and lifetime management.
- [Globalize and localize .NET applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/globalization-and-localization.md): Learn how to develop a world-ready application. Read about globalization, localizability review, and localization in .NET.
- [Globalization and ICU](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/globalization-icu.md): Learn more about: .NET globalization and ICU
- [Globalization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/globalization.md): Learn more about: Globalization
- [High-performance logging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/high-performance-logging.md): Learn how to use LoggerMessage to create cacheable delegates that require fewer object allocations for high-performance logging scenarios.
- [Rate limiting an HTTP handler in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/http-ratelimiter.md): Learn how to create a client-side HTTP handler that limits the number of requests, with the inbuilt rate limiter API from .NET.
- [Keyed DI Support in IHttpClientFactory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/httpclient-factory-keyed-di.md): Learn how to integrate IHttpClientFactory with Keyed Services.
- [Troubleshoot IHttpClientFactory issues](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/httpclient-factory-troubleshooting.md): Learn how to troubleshoot common HttpClient and IHttpClientFactory problems.
- [Use the IHttpClientFactory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/httpclient-factory.md): Learn how to use the HttpClient and IHttpClientFactory implementations with dependency injection in your .NET workloads.
- [Use HTTP/3 with HttpClient](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/httpclient-http3.md): Learn how to use the HttpClient to access HTTP/3 servers in .NET
- [Monitor and analyze HTTP client performance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/httpclient-latency-extensions.md): Learn how to use the HttpClientLatency with dependency injection in your .NET workloads.
- [Customize SNI in HTTP requests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/httpclient-sni.md): Learn How to control Server Name Indication TLS extension in HTTP requests.
- [Localizability review](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/localizability-review.md): Learn about localizability reviews, and when they should occur and how to use them.
- [Localization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/localization.md): Learn the concepts of localization while learning how to use the IStringLocalizer and IStringLocalizerFactory implementations in your .NET workloads.
- [Log buffering](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/log-buffering.md): Learn how to delay log emission using log buffering in .NET applications.
- [Log sampling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/log-sampling.md): Learn how to fine-tune the volume of logs emitted by your application using log sampling.
- [Compile-time logging source generation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/logger-message-generator.md): Learn how to use the LoggerMessageAttribute and compile-time source generation for logging in .NET.
- [Logging guidance for .NET library authors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/logging-library-authors.md): Learn how to expose logging as a library author in .NET. Follow the guidance to ensure your library is correctly exposed to consumers.
- [Logging providers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/logging-providers.md): Learn how the logging provider API is used in .NET applications.
- [Logging in C#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/logging.md): Learn about app logging provided by the Microsoft.Extensions.Logging NuGet package in C#.
- [Options pattern guidance for .NET library authors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/options-library-authors.md): Learn how to expose the options pattern as a library author in .NET. Follow the guidance to ensure your library is correctly exposed to consumers.
- [Compile-time options validation source generation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/options-validation-generator.md): Learn how to utilize compile-time source generation for validating options.
- [Options pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/options.md): Learn the options pattern to represent groups of related settings in .NET apps. The options pattern uses classes to provide strongly-typed access to settings.
- [Package and deploy resources in .NET apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/package-and-deploy-resources.md): Package and deploy resources in .NET apps using a main assembly (hub) and satellite assemblies (spokes). A spoke contains localized resources but no code.
- [Perform culture-insensitive case changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/performing-culture-insensitive-case-changes.md): Learn how to perform culture-insensitive case changes

- [Perform culture-insensitive string operations in arrays](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations-in-arrays.md): Learn how to perform culture-insensitive string operations in arrays.
- [Perform culture-insensitive string operations in collections](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations-in-collections.md): Learn how to perform culture-insensitive string operations in collections.
- [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md): Learn more about: Performing culture-insensitive string operations
- [Use the Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives library](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/primitives.md): Learn about the various primitive types from the Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives library.
- [Create a Queue Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/queue-service.md): Learn how to create a queue service subclass of BackgroundService in .NET.
- [Resources in .NET apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/resources.md): Understand resources in .NET apps. A resource is any non-executable data that's logically deployed with an app.
- [Retrieve resources in .NET apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/retrieve-resources.md): Retrieve resources in .NET apps. Package resources for the default (neutral) culture with the main assembly and create a satellite assembly for each culture.
- [Use scoped services within a BackgroundService](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/scoped-service.md): Learn how to use scoped services within a BackgroundService in .NET.
- [Service discovery in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/service-discovery.md): Learn how to use the Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery library to simplify the integration of service discovery patterns in .NET applications.
- [TLS/SSL best practices](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/sslstream-best-practices.md): Learn the best practices when using SslStream in .NET.
- [Migrate SslStream code from .NET Framework to .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/sslstream-migration-from-framework.md): Learn how to migrate code that uses SslStream in .NET Framework to .NET.
- [Troubleshoot SslStream authentication issues](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/sslstream-troubleshooting.md): Learn how to troubleshoot and investigate issues when performing authentication with SslStream in .NET.
- [Implement the IHostedService interface](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/timer-service.md): Learn how to implement a custom IHostedService interface in C#, much like the inbuilt .NET BackgroundService.
- [Create a Windows Service installer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/windows-service-with-installer.md): Learn how to create a Windows Service installer project.
- [Create Windows Service using BackgroundService](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/windows-service.md): Learn how to create a Windows Service using the BackgroundService in .NET.
- [Working with .resx Files Programmatically](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/work-with-resx-files-programmatically.md): Create or retrieve data from XML resource (.resx) files programmatically using types and members in the System.Resources namespace of the .NET Class Library.
- [Worker Services](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/workers.md): Learn how to implement a custom IHostedService and use existing implementations in C#. Discover various worker implementations, templates, and service patterns.
